Making Fan as real as possible

The makers of Bollywood superstar Shah Rukh Khan’s highly anticipated project Fan have incorporated the actor’s real life fan moments into the film to give it a genuine look.

Shah Rukh, who hails from Delhi, earlier shot the film in a locality here for three days along with director Maneesh Sharma and the creative team. The fan moments on these days were captured for the film.

Be it the fans dancing on the balconies of their house in Dwarka here or on the streets, Shah Rukh’s own fans will become an integral part of the film with candid visuals and raw moments, said a source in the crew. — IANS
title: Real life fan moments added in SRK s Fan
